page.title: 10RECREATION
page.content: Facilities in the village for recreational purposes includethe Pub,the Youth club,Darby and Joan club, the Womens Institute,and events organised by the churches and Sunday school. It is hoped that a playing field will soon be ready for the young people of the village. At the present there is a small play area by the side of the W.I. Hall. In the evenings and at weekends the children of Withernwick take part in a number of activities e.g. swimming, and horse riding being very popular. Karate and Judo, Brownies,Guides,Cubs are some of the clubs the children attend.Some other children like to go to Piano or Ballet lessons.
